createdAt.description: Timestamp for when the order was created

lastUpdated.description: Timestamp for the last update to the order

completedAt.description: Timestamp for when the order was completed

placementType.description: Source type (`grid` or `basePlatform`), from where we're taking it

placementId.description: objectId of the placement (we can have multiple `grid`s `basePlatform`s with the same `preset`)

rowPlacement.description: string identifier for the `row` of a source cell

columnPlacement.description: string identifier for the `column` of a source cell

placementType.description: Destination type (`grid`, `basePlatform`, or `laboratory`), placement to where we're moving it

placementId.description: objectId of the placement (we can have multiple `grid`s `basePlatform`s with the same `preset`)

rowPlacement.description: string identifier for the `row` of a destination cell

columnPlacement.description: string identifier for the `column` of a destination cell

orderType.description: Type of operation (moveWholeStack, moveTopWheel, moveToLaboratory, mergeWheelStack)

source.description: `objectId` of the wheelstack currently placed on the source cell, source cell can't be empty

destination.description: `objectId` of the wheelStack currently placed on the destination cell, destination cell can be empty

items.description: `objectId`'s of the wheels stored in affected wheelStack on the source cell
`objectId`'s of the wheels stored in affected wheelStack on the destination cell
